name: Kings Gambit 3
description:
An open world final-fantasy type RPG with a deep lore. This game is the third and final in the original Kings Gambit trilogy and is the sequel to the original game.

The final game of the trilogy.  This game takes place immediately after the death of Teeja.  Follow the events of Ark as you help him fix the mess he made. Rally up your allies and fight against the tyranny of the Supreme Council. 

(Note: This game was converted to HTML format but this ended in countless bugs so I have provided a downloadable copy of the original game instead.)
